General.Name: Hotel Shilla Co Ltd
General.Description: Hotel Shilla Co.,Ltd operates as a hospitality company. The company operates airport duty-free shops under the The Shilla Duty Free name, which offer various luxury brands in boutique items, fashion, jewelry, cosmetics, watches, etc., as well as an online duty-free shop and a guest lounge. It also operates hotels under the The Shilla Seoul and The Shilla Jeju names; and Hotel Shilla fitness center. Hotel Shilla Co.,Ltd is based in Seoul, South Korea.
